The Platform Vol 1 by Various Artists, released 10 January 2016

1. Asiah x Flo - Dance of 1975
2. Chee - Cringe
3. Jai Tee x High Dude - Irenic
4. Flukeluke - Nomad
5. Flukeluke - Europa
6. False Noise - Formations
7. Hajimari - Only You
8. Clockvice - Forget Me Not
9. Raine - Our Own
10. COPYCATT - Satire
11. RefraQ - Semantics
12. Breathe (Frequent x Hudson Lee Remix)

The Platform is a collection spanning the broadest scopes of forward thinking music over various genres. Meticulously woven to intrigue the listener, the Platform works as a journey through foley-laced downtempo and ambient soundscapes, all the way through to intense and intricate DnB rollers.

This is a masterful exhibition of well rounded tracks by exceptional artists, with futuristic twists on todays modern genres.
